Victor Hugo once said, "There is one thing stronger than all the armies in the world, and that is an idea whose time has come."
One such idea struck the mind of a second-year Biotech student in the march of 2012 and culminated in the form of ProDex. It was the idea that would give platform and voice to innovative Ideas of the students in the coming years. It's been five years since then, and it has given voice and opportunity to many students to express their thoughts and make their imaginations real. 
We as a team have achieved a lot in these five years, but the importance of this journey does not lie in the past but in the achievements that will bless us in the times to come. There is no end to this journey, the journey is an end in itself. 
Thanks, Jai Sankar for such a wonderful gift. 
Thanks to our alumni for the help in the realization of this revolutionary idea. 
At last thanks to the #TeamProDex for the efforts and dedication, you have been putting all these years.
#5YearsOfProDex

#5YearsOfProDex

Innovations are sparked only when we find ourselves facing the barrage of difficulties. We revved up our neurons to kick off 2017 by securing first runner-up in “R3 (Reduce, Recycle, Reuse)”.

R3 is a nation-wide Product Design competition conducted by Abhyuday, IIT Bombay. Three members (Aakash Patidar, Rajesh Prajapati and Harmanjot Singh Grewal) of Team ProDex made it happen. Our idea of a product named “WasteRover” : simple yet efficient automatic floating water waste collector was made up from everyday waste materials.
Our Product:
